## Getting 

list of my repos from github

```{r}
library(httr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
r <- GET("https://api.github.com/users/a-ramji/repos")

my_repos_list <- content(r)

my_repos <- map_chr(my_repos_list, "full_name")

my_repos
```
